name: ! PANIC !
description:
Time to ! PANIC !

Short, quite-difficult-sometimes-quite-frustrating-game where you have to survive as long as you can.

Controls:

Arrow keys/AD to steer the ship, spacebar to slow-mo.

Credits:

Game by poppants

Music by AdhesiveWombat

Get it on your Android device absolutely for FREE with no ads, in-game purchases or other bullcr@p!
